roleset.name: become incandescent
roleset.note: INCANDESCE-V NOTES: Corrected by Claire (from incandesce.01-v)

example.name: Incandescent pain
example.text: Then the pain of anguish returned and it incandesced, each point blazing through his immortal soul.
example.arg: each point blazing through his immortal soul.

example.name: With location
example.text: Small bubbles of light incandesced within the walls.
